data.message: this guy raps shit lately i dnt knw whtsup with these fast flows he has on each nd every track' man fix your shit i only listen the old shady... not this

replies.message: He bores me in no favourz

No Favourz was shit.  I tried to listen to it but between the music & Big Sean (who I don't like), I made it through the song twice.
👏👏 dont like, dont listen haha
Wow
dis "fast flow" with passion it's kidda dope ..especially when one is depressed
Atleast he doesnt spit mumble rap😂

It's not a fast flow on every single song nowadays, and he's more lyrical than he's ever been. As for the comments, No favors might have sounded bad, but it was lyrically good and fit the theme of the song. I'd suggest you all stop listening to mumble shit.

His fast, choppy flow is fucking horrible. I'm a die-hard Em fan, but his sound is trash these days. His lyricism is on point, as usual, and it's even getting better and better. However, that doesn't mean shit if no one likes the way you sound. Which is the overwhelming majority of fans. We want SHADY back.
nigga go listen to fucking desiigner.
Would da real slimshady plz cumbek
Old like Infinite old? Or do you even know about Infinite
Trump's a bitch I'll make his whole brand go under

Stop trying to force the guy into a slim shady sized box. His current flow isn't bad at all. In fact it's highly technical and super difficult to do. Fuck..on no favors he shadow boxed all his bars. If you don't know what that means then just stfu. Em mastered all the old flows so he literally moved on to new ones. All I Think About is chicken scratch flow. Vegas is chainsaw flow. Em is syncopating and rhyming on downbeats and upbeats and everywhere in between. Hes flowing to parts of the beat besides the bass or snare. Hes incorporated modern day battle rap into his writing technique and using modern day battle rap stunt work in his delivery.  Imo his current flow is even better than slim shady bc its less mainstream and different and going against the current grain of shit like migos or Lil yachty. He left behind that nursery school way of flowing. Y'all just need to open your minds and let go of the nostalgia.
Justin Paul you want Slim Shady back? listen to "groundhog day" from the LP2 deluxe album or Shady XV the track

Obviously the reason em is so great is his lyricism, but he's innovative as fuck and a lot of people don't like change. He's always trying something new. And wether you like the sound or not, he does great as what he does
Simply put. You're missing out.
You're mad that your retarded brain isn't intelligent enough to keep up with the fast pace of things. Go listen to Kodak or some shit.
Obviously your not a Em fan..Real Em fan give a shit how he sounds..As long as he spits that shit
